english.segment1: This piece of pride, holding you down. The knives are drawn, stabbing at the pieces. The strings that held me, choking off the air. That I cant breathe, these hands around my neck
english.segment2: I warned you, To feel what I do now. This hope that surrounds us, Keeps us safe tonight.
english.segment3: I warned you, To feel what I do now. This hope that surrounds us, Keeps us safe tonight.
